mapper.sql: id, menu_name, menu_price, menu_image, create_user_id, is_delete, gmt_create, gmt_modified, menu_text, menu_floor, menu_window, canteen_name
mapper.insert:
insert into menu_ae
id,
menu_name,
menu_price,
menu_image,
create_user_id,
is_delete,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
menu_text,
menu_floor,
menu_window,

mapper.update:
update menu_ae
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_price = #{menuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
menu_image = #{menuImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
menu_text = #{menuText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_floor = #{menuFloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_window = #{menuWindow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
canteen_name = #{canteenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update menu_ae set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_price = #{menuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, menu_image = #{menuImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, menu_text = #{menuText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_floor = #{menuFloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_window = #{menuWindow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canteen_name = #{canteenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from menu_ae where is_delete=0
AND menu_name LIKE concat( '%',#{menuName},'%')
AND create_user_id=#{createUserId}

select
from menu_ae where 1=1 AND is_delete=0
AND menu_name LIKE concat( '%',#{menuName},'%')
AND create_user_id=#{createUserId}
